des: "A quick, simple and delicious treat.  Sometimes I top it off with some orange zest for color.  Don't laugh...it's simple, but delicious and quick and I've never found any one who didn't rave about it!"
ins: Place doughnut in an attractive serving bowl.  Top with a generous scoop of ice cream.  Spoon marmalade over ice cream, and pour liqueur on top.  Top with whipped cream and enjoy.
